en-US.summary: Check ferry schedules from Red Hook Brooklyn with real-time updates and service alerts
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask red hook ferry when is the next ferry
Alexa, ask red hook ferry for ferries to Wall Street
Alexa, ask red hook ferry are there any service alerts
en-US.name: Red Hook Ferry Checker
en-US.description: Get real-time ferry schedules and service alerts for NYC Ferry's Red Hook route. Check departure times to Manhattan (Wall Street/Pier 11) and Bay Ridge, with live updates and service disruption notifications.

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: This skill provides real-time NYC Ferry schedules for the Red Hook route in Brooklyn. Test with phrases like 'when is the next ferry', 'ferries to Wall Street', or 'are there any service alerts'.
